name: Block the Block
description:
PvP

2player, Red vs Blue, game.Each Player can not touch each others block but you can touch your blocks.If the other player touches your block they die and you get a point.The point of this game is to block the other player with out touching his/her blocks so he/she has no where else to go and touch your block, but you can play the games how ever you want.

(Please leave a comment rating it from 1 through 10 of how good the game is and how I can make it better, and what you liked.) check my out on Ludum Dare 36, Ancient_Artifact)and please think to donate for future multiplayer online & local and Playeble in eny platforms.

bugs: "this games has bugs that I am working to solve, please leave a comment on other bugs you might see."

when finished and want to play again refresh the page.

the character(S) may get stuck on the top left corner, refresh the page.

working on music.

Controls:

"WHEN PLAYING PLEASE MAKE SURE YOU HAVE THE NUM-LOCK ON"

blue:

w.a.s.d, there are yellow blocks you can go through or down through. press d to go down and w to jump up.

to place blocks press Space-bar

8.4.5.6 on the numberpad, there are red blocks you can go through or down through. press 5 to go down and 8 to jump up.

to place block press L
